attributes.name: sequenceNr
attributes.label: Sequence number
attributes.description: Number that defines order of attributes in a entity

attributes.name: mappedBy
attributes.label: Mapped by
attributes.description: Attribute in the referenced entity that owns the relationship of a onetomany attribute

attributes.name: orderBy
attributes.label: Order by
attributes.description: Order expression that defines entity collection order of a onetomany attribute (e.g. "attr0", "attr0,ASC", "attr0,DESC" or "attr0,ASC;attr1,DESC"

attributes.name: expression
attributes.label: Expression
attributes.description: Computed value expression in Magma JavaScript

refEntity.name: sys_md_Tag
refEntity.label: Tag
refEntity.description: Semantic tags that can be applied to entities, attributes and other data

items.name: aggregate_threshold
items.label: Aggregate threshold
items.description: Aggregate value counts below this threshold are reported as the threshold. (e.g. a count of 100 is reported as <= 10)

items.name: custom_javascript
items.label: Custom javascript headers
items.description: Custom javascript headers, specified as comma separated list. These headers will be included in the molgenis header before the applications own javascript headers.

items.name: ga_privacy_friendly
items.label: IP anonymization
items.description: Disables the cookie wall by using privacy friendly tracking (only works if google analytics accounts are configured correctly, see below)

items.name: ga_acc_privacy_friendly
items.label: Google analytics account privacy friendly
items.description: Confirm that you have configured your Google Analytics account as described here: https://cbpweb.nl/sites/default/files/atoms/files/handleiding_privacyvriendelijk_instellen_google_analytics_0.pdf

items.name: ga_tracking_id_mgs
items.label: Google analytics tracking ID (MOLGENIS)
items.description: Google analytics tracking ID used by MOLGENIS

items.name: ga_acc_privacy_friendly_mgs
items.label: Google analytics account privacy friendly (MOLGENIS)
items.description: Confirm that the MOLGENIS Google Analytics account is configured as described here: https://cbpweb.nl/sites/default/files/atoms/files/handleiding_privacyvriendelijk_instellen_google_analytics_0.pdf

items.name: tracking_code_footer
items.label: Tracking code footer
items.description: JS tracking code that is placed in the footer HTML (e.g. PiWik). This enables the cookie wall.

items.name: active
items.label: Active
items.description: Boolean to indicate whether this group is in use.

items.name: url
items.label: Url
items.description: Url of the file to download.

items.name: failureEmail
items.label: Failure email
items.description: Leave blank if you don't want to receive emails if the jobs failed.

items.name: sequenceNr
items.label: Sequence number
items.description: Number that defines order of attributes in a entity
